Elections
=========

Current General Election Information:

The City has three positions up for election for the May 2, 2026 General Election which are Mayor, Position 4, and Position 5 these are all for a 2 year term.  If interested in running for a position packets can be picked up at City Hall starting on  from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Filing period starts on Wednesday, January 14, 2026 and ends on Friday, February 13, 2026 @ 5:00 p.m.

Early Voting by personal appearance starts on

Election day is on Saturday, May 2, 2026 from 7:00 am to 7:00 pm.

Future General Election Information:

May 2026- Places – Mayor, 4, and 5 are up for election

May 2027 – Places – 1,2, and 3 are up for election

May 2028 – Places – Mayor, 4, and 5 are up for election

May 2029 – Places – 1,2, and 3 are up for election

May 2030 – Places Mayor, 4, and 5 are up for election

##### Tax Information

This budget will raise more revenue from property taxes than last year’s budget by an amount of $6,838.00, which is a .0096 increase from last year’s budget. The property tax revenue to be raised from new property added to the tax roll this year is $70,742.
